member.name: T:System.Net.Http.RtcRequestFactory
member.summary: Represents the class that is used to create special for use with the Real-Time-Communications (RTC) background notification infrastructure.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.RtcRequestFactory.Create(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod,System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a special for use with the Real-Time-Communications (RTC) background notification infrastructure.
member.returns: Returns .An HTTP request message for use with the RTC background notification infrastructure.
member.param: The Uri the request is sent to.
